nodes.text: Fruit punch was a fruit beverage that was consumable by humans, and could be served in glasses. In 40 BBY, the Pijali Princess Fanry attended a private yacht party sponsored by the company Czerka Corporation on the Inner Rim planet Pijal, which was put on to celebrate her upcoming coronation. She sipped from a pink glass of fruit punch while speaking with the company's Sector Supervisor Meritt Col.
Fruit punch first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel by Claudia Gray.
